page.title: 20Withybrook PAGE 2
page.content: There are few farms in{Withybrook} today.Before the War the Village school had about 30 children taught by {Mrs. Lucas}and the{Headmistress.}They were the children of farm workers. Today there are fewer than 15 children of school age and they go by school bus to{Monks Kirby Combined School. Housing in{Withybrook}is expensive because of people moving in to the area to retire. On{Fridays},a private coach firm, {Vanguards of Bulkington},takes shoppers from{Withybrook to Bedworth. There is no public transport in {Withybrook}and no shops. There is one inn,"The Pheasant"which attracts people from all over the area.
